Articles.Content: Okay, so im making my own little flag mod but i want all the new flags to show up under a Seperate category from the rest, has anyone figured this one out yet?

Best that can be done without code and a DLL is to use the following folders placed inside GameData;

  • GameData/Modname/Flags = normal flag grouping
  • GameData/Modname/FlagsAgency = grouped with the "Space Agency" flags
  • GameData/Modname/FlagsOrganizations = grouped with the "Organizations" flags

The SpaceCanada and Masseffect flags are in my "GameData/Caerfinon" folder in the directories named above. The other flags are Squad defaults

ive got that part all handled already, I essentially want to create my own categories for different mission types, personal / country flags etc, i fully expect to have to create some tpe of small mod to do this, but i haven't seen anyone else do it yet or know if its even possible so i cant find anywhere to look for that.

1 hour ago, Dackary McDab said:

i haven't seen anyone else do it yet or know if its even possible so i cant find anywhere to look for that

You could look through the API documentation. See how flags are defined and grouped and see if you can make code to add a new type.

See ->https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/api/index.html
